description: Initialization and configuration of a Flask web application with CORS and API setup, including OpenAPI documentation settings.

classes.name: Flask
classes.description: Main Flask application object for configuring and running the web server.

classes.name: Api
classes.description: Object from flask_smorest used to handle API-related functionalities, including documentation and blueprint registration.

methods.name: app.url_map.strict_slashes
methods.description: Configures URL handling to allow or disallow trailing slashes.

methods.name: CORS(app, resources)
methods.description: Enables Cross-Origin Resource Sharing for the Flask app, allowing it to handle requests from different origins.

methods.name: api.register_blueprint
methods.description: Registers a Flask Blueprint for routing, in this case, the health check routes.
